name: Just Jump (itch) (Sushant)
description:
Save your Ninja Buddy from the Ninja Stars!!

Jump,Dodge,Collect Powerups and break the Highscore!!!

A 2d Endless Runner Game

Controls:

Press Space to jump from wall to wall

Use arrow keys to switch between levels in main menu

Made for -  Mini Jam 97

Made By: Sushant

Libraries Used: Pygame

Player Made By: Clembod

Graphical assets: Flaticon

if you have any issue or you found a bug email me at sahaynitu12@gmail.com
